alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:29PM EDT until July 20 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BRANCH AND HILLSDALE COUNTIES... At 328 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Quincy, or near Coldwater, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Coldwater, Hillsdale, Jonesville, Quincy, Litchfield, Jerome, Somerset, Pittsford, Moscow, North Adams, Bear Lake, Allen, Lake Wilson, Shadyside, Osseo, South Butler, and Somerset Center. This includes Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 13 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
